title: Only 18 and Crushing the Elite: Junior World Champ Cat Ferguson Blows Away WorldTour Favorites at Binche
content:
'It's really surreal': Newly crowned junior road and TT champion continues meteoric rise at Binche-Chimay-Binche with fourth win in five race-days.

Read the full article at Only 18 and Crushing the Elite: Junior World Champ Cat Ferguson Blows Away WorldTour Favorites at Binche on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
